name: coder
description: Coder is an enterprise-ready developer workspace management platform that lets teams run cloud-based VS Code and JetBrains environments. It supports infrastructure provisioning and integrates with AWS, Kubernetes, and Terraform.

features.title: Cloud Workspaces
features.description: Run VS Code and JetBrains IDEs in the cloud. Code from anywhere

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Built for teams with security and compliance features. Scale with confidence

features.title: Kubernetes Ready
features.description: Deploy on AWS, GCP, Azure, or Kubernetes. Choose your infrastructure

features.title: Resource Management
features.description: Control compute resources and costs efficiently. Optimize spending automatically

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Share workspaces and standardize development environments. Everyone stays in sync
